Title: Winterdance.
Subtitle: The Fine Madness of Running the Iditarod.
Authors: Gary Paulsen.
Categories: Pets.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=BSVtQXGgdKwC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Paulsen and his team of dogs endured snowstorms, frostbite, dogfights, moose attacks, sleeplessness, and hallucinations in the relentless push to go on. Map and color photographs..
